banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 EMULSION ASPHALT
banner.subtitle: Eco-friendly solution for modern road pavement

usage.title: Usage
usage.text: Road pavement, tile adhesive, seal coating, resurfacing, and as filler material.

technical.p1: Bitumen emulsion is produced by milling bitumen into microscopic particles and dispersing it in water using chemical emulsifiers. The small droplets of bitumen remain uniformly suspended until the emulsion is used.
technical.p2: The chemistry of the bitumen emulsion determines the stability of the system. When applied in the field, the system eventually breaks, allowing the bitumen and water to separate. The water evaporates, leaving behind a bitumen residue that coats and bonds aggregates during road applications.
technical.p3: XOLABIT bitumen emulsion has a wide range of applications, from tile adhesive to undercoating vehicles. Its primary use is for highways, including seal coating and recycling systems.

banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 POLYMER ASPHALT
banner.subtitle: Flexible and durable solution for modern infrastructure

usage.title: Usage
usage.text: Paving for airstrips, urban roads, toll roads, and other asphalt applications.

technical.p1: Polymer Modified Asphalt (PMA) has been used for years to reduce damage severity and extend the life of pavement and hot mix asphalt surfacing.
technical.p2: XOLABIT offers the industry's most advanced PMA line, designed to maximize the beneficial effects of binder on permanent deformation, fatigue, and low-temperature cracking under your environmental and traffic conditions.
technical.benefit1: Better resistance to permanent deformation (rutting and shoving)
technical.benefit2: Significantly improves tensile strength and elastic modulus
technical.benefit3: Enhanced fatigue resistance and temperature stability
technical.benefit5: Extends service life and life cycle
technical.benefit6: No special handling or storage conditions required
technical.benefit7: No special equipment needed for transport or paving

banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 ASPHALTIC PLUG JOINT
banner.subtitle: Durable and flexible expansion joint system for bridges

usage.title: Usage
usage.text: Ideal for bridge joints, concrete pavement, waterproofing, building expansion joints, concrete joint sealant, and other flexible bitumen applications.

technical.p1: XOLABIT Asphaltic Plug is designed for low to medium movement expansion joints, ideal for highway bridges and similar structures.
technical.p2: The maximum design joint movement is ±25 mm horizontal and ±1.5 mm vertical.

banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 BITUMEN MEMBRANE
banner.subtitle: a flexible latex-reinforced coating to protect surfaces

bitumenmembrane.application_paragraph: Can be applied on walls, roofs, gutters, under pipes, and pools.
bitumenmembrane.desc_1: XOLABIT Bitumen Membrane is a general-purpose surface protection coating. It is reinforced with rubber latex for flexibility and improved strength.
bitumenmembrane.desc_2: XOLABIT Bitumen Membrane can be used for retaining walls, planter boxes, roofs, gutters, under pipes, and in many cases is required for water channel inspection. The product is safe for water contact and suitable for submerged conditions such as pools and water features.

banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 BITUMEN PAINT
banner.subtitle: a cold coating that effectively protects from weather and corrosion

bitumenpaint.application_paragraph: Can be used on pipes, concrete, steel structures, wood, and marine vessels, stairs, bridges, gutters, underground pipes, fences, gates, etc.
bitumenpaint.desc_1: XOLABIT BITUMEN PAINT is used as a cold, protective, effective, weather-resistant and anti-corrosion coating required for concrete and exposed/buried metal surfaces such as corrugated sheets, emergency stairs, gutters, pipes, fences, gates, and more.
bitumenpaint.desc_2: XOLABIT BITUMEN PAINT can also be used as a primer for sheet and liquid membranes. It is suitable for marine use and steel surfaces, behind insulation and non-water tanks. It can also be applied on concrete and masonry as a damp-proof coating.

banner.title:
XOLABIT 
 BITUMEN COLDMIX
banner.subtitle: Practical and fast solution for road repair without heating

usage.title: Usage
usage.text: Suitable for minor repairs on sidewalks, access roads, potholes, storage areas, and job sites.

technical.p1: Cold asphalt mix refers to asphalt combined with unheated aggregates, mineral fillers, and asphalt emulsion. This mix can be used throughout the day and is ideal for repairing various road surfaces.
technical.p2: This mixture requires no heating, is flexible, and can self-heal even under pressure and low temperatures.
technical.p3: Our Coldmix Plant enables custom designs tailored to customer needs. Therefore, our cold asphalt is widely accepted by various sectors.

waterpoofingapplication.title: Application
waterpoofingapplication.subtitle: Application
waterpoofingapplication.paragraph: Protects walls from moisture, coats water tanks, prevents rust on underside, steel structures and roof frames of vehicles, leak-proof for gutters and zinc roofs, kitchens, bathrooms, concrete structures, boats, and fishing vessels.

waterpoofingbitumen.desc1: XOLABIT manufactures and supplies a complete line of waterproof and damp-proof membranes.
waterpoofingbitumen.desc2: Waterproof membranes form a seamless monolithic continuous layer, impermeable to moisture penetration and remain flexible at various temperatures. Suitable for applications from bridges to roof terraces.
waterpoofingbitumen.desc3: Damp-proof membranes are a blend of selected bitumen and petroleum reducers, meeting primer requirements for damp/waterproof checks. They can be used as a surface conditioner to enhance adhesion between substrate and waterproof membrane or other bituminous coatings, and as a waterproofing layer to prevent vapor migration through masonry or concrete structures.
